TutorialScene:
Have you come to Pontake Hollow for the ascension? 
		Understandable as it is the only thing left of this land.
To do so, you must seek out three Great Entities. None but three of them remain.
The Aimless Titan, Mistern the Giant, and The Wall. Seek them out and find their gifts.
introLevel1: Indiscriminate in stasis as it was in motion.
Learn what it means to stand before a Great Entity.
Now go. Find a loose piece of the Aimless Titan.
introLevel2: Heed my warning. Above you rests a great fog. Your path will be unclear. Your next step uncertain.
Stay focused. Take your time and capture the giant’s essence.
introLevel3:
“For those who must fall into the sky,
		climb The Wall.
		Shed the burdens that kept you grounded,
		it’s too late.”
May you find peace in this land.
supersecret1: Ok you aren't supposed to be here
supersecret2: Wah! I've been found? I'll tell you something interesting then.
Did you know there are 11 different types of fog?
supersecret3: Walls are meant to be broken.
Sorry I was trying to say something deep but it was kinda generic.
Please ignore that. Come back once I've workshopped it.
